p: We compare the inflow into the Al-Wehda reservoir in the future to the baseline period (1981â€“2010) transboundary Yarmouk river flow to Jordan. Note that the Al-Wehda dam was not constructed until 2005. Comparison of future annual average transboundary streamflow to Jordan with respect to the baseline period under the above scenarios reveals two-key potential future impacts ( Fig. 8A):
